EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Followup - DNA
EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp Webinar Followup
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I'm sorry you were unable to attend the IntApp webinar on the ABA changes to Rule 1.10 last week. We had over 100 attendees and have received very positive feedback.
A recording of the webinar is now available on our website and can be found at http://www.intapp.com/products/wbwebinars.html.
